column1: Students, quiet! Quiet please!  Give me your attention!
Eric, at Greeley Elementary we do not tolerate students making fun of other students.
A twenty-minute song and dance number with forty seven "Yo momma so poor" jokes directed at Jacob Hallery, which ended in a finale with fireworks.
Your case worker has been notified, and he is not happy.
What the hell does this have to do with anything?!
